Name:
Marsuinul
TS-2 (Cyrillic: ТС-2)
Fate:
Captured by the Soviet Union
Sunk by internal explosion
Propulsion: 2 MAN diesel engines, 2 electric motors, 2 shafts
Speed:
16 knots (30 km/h; 18 mph) surfaced
9 knots (17 km/h; 10 mph) submerged
Armament:
1 x 105 mm SK C/32 naval gun
1 x 37 mm SK C/30 AA gun
6 ×  533 mm  torpedo tubes
